creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Elizabeth and Willard Clark
inscription: (A hidden spring cuts through the belly of the rocks; / Its jewel-like sound permeates the mouth of the embankment. / Old nests appear on withered leafless branches; / Coral, under the snow, shines scarlet.) (SA)
markings: URC, LLQ; labels on roller ends: [Tetto]
title: Hidden Spring
